ReSpliceCharmweavers.ThrallWorkModeDef.label: work
ReSpliceCharmweavers.ThrallWorkModeDef.description: Work autonomously according to thrall’s job assignment. Automatically goes to fulfil their needs when needed.

ReSpliceCharmweavers.ThrallWorkModeDef.label: escort
ReSpliceCharmweavers.ThrallWorkModeDef.description: Stay near their master and fight nearby enemies. Follow their master even off the map.

ReSpliceCharmweavers.ThrallWorkModeDef.label: worship
ReSpliceCharmweavers.ThrallWorkModeDef.description: Stay near their master and entertain them socially to keep their mood up. Do not follow their master even off the map.
